relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, mucous membranes moist, oropharynx clear
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, diminished breath sounds at lung bases, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.abdomen: Right-sided flank tenderness, warm to touch, non-erythematous, soft, tender in the mid-epigastric area, non-distended, bowel sounds present, no rebound tenderness or guarding, no organomegaly
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis, or edema
